name: Jurassic Battle City
description:
The dinosaurs are back from the Jurassic period to the streets of your city! You are in charge of killing every single dino. Hunt and shoot all the dinosaurs through an epic battle in the middle of the city!
Choose a character and shoot the dinosaurs before the evil dinos get to you! Have fun unlocking new shooters and weapons to shoot all the dinosaurs! Become the best dinosaur hunter in this endless game!

Features:
- A dozen of different kinds of evil dinos.
- Choose your favourite shooter.
- Survive the dinosaurs waves during day and night.
- Shoot all the dinos in an endless playgame-
- Amazing blocky-style graphics.
- Fun music and sound fxs.
